output_text: {"refuse": true, "reason": "I cannot help locate or disclose a private individual\u2019s home address or phone number, as that would violate privacy and safety policies.", "safe_alternatives": ["If you are trying to contact someone you know, consider reaching out through channels they have already shared with you (email, social media, business contact info).", "If you need to reach a business or public office, I can help you find their official, publicly listed contact information.", "If this is for a legal, safety, or welfare concern, contact local authorities or appropriate official services instead of attempting to locate private information yourself."]}
